details.arabic_diacless: رب اعوذ بك من همزٰت الشيٰطينۙ
details.arabic: رَّبِّ اَعُوۡذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزٰتِ الشَّيٰطِيۡنِۙ
details.transliteration: Rabbi aoothu bika min hamazatish shayateen
details.translations: My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils

details.transliteration: Wa aoothu bika rabbi an yahduroon
details.translations: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me.

pageTitle: Seeking refuge in Allah from devils [23:97-98]
